sub_title: Team Lead | Account Coordinator | Operation Specialist
summary:
Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I am a results-driven professional with a proven track record in strategic account management, operational excellence, and customer-centric solutions. With a career spanning over 5 years, I have honed my expertise in delivering exceptional service, optimising processes, & fostering cross-functional collaboration.

Strategic Account Management
As an Account Coordinator, I partnered closely with a diverse set of clients, offering personalized insights into various machine types and their applications. My goal was not just customer satisfaction, but customer success. I leveraged data-driven insights to empower informed decision-making, building lasting relationships based on trust and value.

Efficiency in Logistics & Delivery
My role involved monitoring and tracking of delivery schedules, ensuring damage-proof delivery of machines while adhering to tight deadlines. By collaborating seamlessly with internal teams, I streamlined operations and significantly reduced delivery-related issues, enhancing overall service quality.

Data-Driven Decision Making & Process Optimisation
I played a pivotal role in preparing accurate machine order forecasts and optimizing inventory levels. By analyzing key data, I provided actionable insights that drove business decisions and facilitated efficient resource allocation. Moreover, I led the integration of various modules within our ERP software, enhancing operational efficiency across the board.

Customer-Centric Service & Compliance
Beyond the sale, I delivered exceptional after-sales service, promptly addressing customer concerns and ensuring timely issue resolution. My expertise in KYC and onboarding processes ensured seamless customer integration while upholding compliance standards, contributing to a smooth customer journey.

Cross-Functional Collaboration
I thrive in collaborative environments. I fostered open communication and cooperation across departments and individuals, proactively resolving challenges and facilitating seamless operations. This approach facilitated successful problem-solving.

Financial Stewardship
My dedication to financial integrity led me to resolve billing discrepancies efficiently, resulting in on-time payment receipt for 90% of orders. 

I am excited to connect with professionals, share insights, and explore new opportunities. My multifaceted skill set, encompassing account management, logistics optimisation, process efficiency, and cross-functional teamwork, positions me as a valuable asset in driving operational excellence and enriching customer experiences.

school.name: Shri Chankya Education Societys Indira College of Engineering & Technoloogy, Parandawadi, Tal.Maval,Dist. Pune

profile_positions.description:
-	End to end account management of customer; recommended machines to customers as per their requirement
-	Initiated KYC and onboarding of new customers  along with final order approval from customers
-	Procured packing machines from small scale vendors using just in time framework + customer demand
-	Resolved billing issues with customer and ensured on-time payment was received for 90% of the orders
-	Maintained crisp communications with clients and service providers; and ensuring that delivery of their orders happened as per the schedule agreed which resulted in additional orders worth $ 0.5 million
-	Provided after service to customers and ensured their complaints were solved in a timely manner by constant follow-up with our maintenance team
-	Prepared monthly reports which included current order log, future forecast and present inventory levels
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Account Coordinator
